MELEE_DMGDescription: Melee Mastery is added to Elemental Mastery to increase damage dealt to targets within 2 cells from the attacker.
RANGED_DMGDescription: Distance Mastery is added to Elemental Mastery to increase damage dealt to targets that are 3 cells or greater from the attacker.
SINGLE_TARGET_DMGDescription: Single Target Mastery is added to Elemental Mastery to increase damage to a single target from spells and weapons.
AOE_DMGDescription: Area Mastery is added to Elemental Mastery to increase damage to multiple targets from spells and weapons.
FINAL_DMG_IN_PERCENTDescription: Increases the percentage of Damage that you inflict.
